bibdata.title: IEC/IEEE International Draft
Nuclear power plants
Instrumentation and control important to safety -- Electrical equipment condition monitoring methods -- Part 1: General
IEC/IEEE International Draft - Nuclear power plants - Instrumentation and control important to safety -- Electrical equipment condition monitoring methods -- Part 1: General

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This International Standard contains requirements for application of the IEC/IEEE 62582- series of methods for condition monitoring in electrical equipment important to safety of nuclear power plants. It also includes requirements which are common to all methods.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
